She speaks funny Japanese, courtesy of Tsuchimikado teaching her. She might sound simple and irresponsible, but behind her smile lies a cold and calculating personality. She loves baths and has a collection of the latest bath accessories from Academy City.

character.name: Judgment
character.description: The public moral committee. It is made up of students with powers from every grade level whose duty is to maintain peace and order within the school system. As most of the city population are students, it is the duty of Judgment to catch those delinquents misusing their powers along with other offenders and protect the students. Each district in Academy City has at least one Judgment branch office headed by a senior student who serves as a police chief. In the event of a situation that Judgment members cannot handle, their superiors and the city`s security forces, the Anti-Skills will take over. Overall, the role of a Judgment officer is more like a part-time civilian patrol officer as their authority is normally limited to their district area where their local Judgment branch office is located and they can only use their authority at other districts when ordered to by their superiors or in cases of emergency. Most Judgment members can be recognized by the green stripped arm band with a shield symbol they wear.

character.name: Anti-Skill
character.description: Anti-Skill is the city`s police and security forces. Unlike Judgment, most members of Anti-Skills are adults who are mostly normal people and even school teachers who are trained to deal with the city`s day-to-day activities and security, in addition to dealing with rogue psychics who abuse their powers. Most members of Anti-Skills are seen with special SWAT armor that resist psychic powers along with firearms and riot gear, which shows how serious the situation has to be for them to be called out. They are also responsible in investigating and stopping the experiments that are against the law and inhumane to students but due to the interventions by the city administration, they are stopped from investigating experiments that were approved by the Board of Directors. Their symbol is a three-point spear shaped like a capital "E" turned 90 degrees to the left.

character.name: Tokiwadai Chuugaku
character.description: One of the elite five schools of Academy City, this elite girls middle school is located within District 7, the School Garden.

character.name: Musujime Awaki
character.description: Musujime Awaki is a sophomore attending Kirigaoka Academy for Girls. She is a Level 4 esper with a teleport ability called Move Point (座標移動, Zahyou Idou). Her teleportation powers are more powerful than Kuroko as she can teleport anything weighing up to 4,500kg without even touching it by a distance up to 800 meters. However, due to a past trauma where she miscalculated and teleported her leg inside a wall, accidentally tearing her leg skin and muscles out from the wall and almost dying, she has a fear of using her powers on herself and feels physically ill whenever she is forced to teleport herself. This fear prevents her from becoming a Level 5. She steals a remnant of the destroyed Tree Diagram and confronts Kuruko and Mikoto. However, she is beaten by Accelerator and the remnant is destroyed. Awaki is one of the guides to the windowless building where Aleister Crowley resides. She is also living with Tsukuyomi Komoe. Later, she is blackmailed to join team Group.

character.name: Necessarius
character.description: Necessarius is the secret magical branch of the Church of England. Officially named the Church of Necessary Evil, the organization was started by Puritans who despise the use of magic in England and sought to destroy it by using magic themselves but now the organization no longer has an anti-magic stance and supports magic. Officially, Necessarius is under the authority of the Archbishop of Canterbury but the current leader and Archbishop of Necessarius secretly controls the Archbishop of Canterbury thus Necessarius is the true power behind the Anglican Church. As one of the three magic powers of Britain, Necessarius represent the religious magic community. Necessarius is currently led by Archbishop Laura Stuart.

character.name: Misawa Juku
character.description: Misawa Juku was a school which degenerated into a cult that centered its worship on science. It converted people by saying rare abilities could be copied and given to someone else. Aureolus Izzard eventually took over the school and destroyed the cult, as he needed Himegami to obtain a vampire. Aureolus converted the cram school into his fortress.

character.name: Roman Seikyou Juu-San Kishi Dan
character.description: The Roman Seikyou Juu-San Kishi Dan, or Thirteen Knights of the Roman Catholic Church, is a group of warriors created by the Roman Catholic Church. They were once dispatched to hunt and eliminate Aureolus Izzard but were decimated by him.

character.name: Gakuen Toshi
character.description: Gakuen Toshi, or Academy City, is a city of several schools and institutions of higher learning from kindergarten to university level that learn side-by-side along with the scientists who research on psychic powers and higher technology, the latter being one of the primary reasons for its establishment. It is the most advanced city in the world and its technology is said to be 30 years ahead of what`s `outside` of it.

character.name: Tatsugami Otohime
character.description: Tatsugami Otohime is Kamijou Touma`s cousin and appears during the Angel Fall Incident. Her true appearance is only seen in a picture as her outer appearance was changed to look like Misaka Mikoto for the duration of the Angel Fall Incident.

character.name: Gabriel
character.description: Gabriel is an archangel that appears during the Angel Fall Incident. It first appeared under the name Misha Croitsef while inhabiting Sasha Croitsef`s body.

character.name: Magical Powered Kanamin
character.description: Magical Powered Kanamin is the titular character of the eponymous Magical Powered Kanamin anime which airs in Academy City. The anime is about the adventures of a young girl with magic powers on the run from Roman Catholic Church witch hunters. Index is a big fan of it.

character.name: Toaru Koukou
character.description: Toaru Koukou (A Certain High School) is the term usually used to describe the high school Kamijou Touma attends. Its official name is unknown.

character.name: Level 5
character.description: Within Academy City, the Level 5s are the most powerful psychics in the city. The following are the currently known Level 5s; ranked not by strength but by how useful they are to http://anidb.net/ch2731 [Aleister]`s plans. 1.) http://anidb.net/ch10527 [Accelerator] 2.) http://anidb.net/ch98257 [Kakine Teitoku] 3.) http://anidb.net/ch2469 [Misaka Mikoto] 4.) http://anidb.net/ch56199 [Mugino Shizuri] 5.) http://anidb.net/ch54960 [Shokuhou Misaki] 6.) Unknown. A possible impersonator claiming to be Aihana Etsu has appeared. 7.) http://anidb.net/ch107656 [Sogiita Gunha]

character.name: Innocentius
character.description: A 3000-degree-Celsius fire monster which can be summoned by Stiyl Magnus.

character.name: Misaka 10031
character.description: Misaka 10031 is one of the many clones of Misaka Mikoto and the first clone that Kamijou Touma meets.

character.name: Annihilatus
character.description: Annihilatus is a secret branch of the Russian Orthodox Church that deals with magic, specifically the disposal of spirits and such that should not exist. It is the Russian counterpart of the Anglican Church`s Necessarius.

character.name: Roshia Seikyou
character.description: The Russian Orthodox Church is the largest of the Orthodox Churches and one of the three world`s largest Christian organizations.

character.name: Souji Robo
character.description: Cleaning Robots are automated cylindrical machine designed to clean the grounds of Academy City. They can be described as mobile trashbins.

character.name: Golem Ellis
character.description: A golem summoned by Sherry Cromwell.

episode.title: 学園都市
Academy City
Miasto akademickie
Gakuen Toshi
episode.summary: Kamijo meets Index, who is on the run from a magic society that wants the library of forbidden knowledge stored in her memory. Later, Kamijo is shocked to find Index at his house – bleeding and accompanied by a strange man. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 魔女狩りの王[イノケンティウス]
Innocentius (The Witch Hunter King)
Innocentius
episode.summary: The magician reveals that his name is Stiyl Magnus and explains that his partner Kaori Kanzaki unintentionally hurt Index as her magical garb was supposed to stop the blow. His mission was actually to protect Index, who possesses photographic memory of the 103,000 grimoires implanted in her mind called the Index Librorum Prohibitorum. Angered by Stiyl`s harsh treatment of Index, Touma attacks him, to which Stiyl responds by using fire magic and is surprised when Tōma nullifies the spell. To stop Touma, Stiyl summons a fire creature known as Innocentius. When Touma finds himself unable to negate the creature, Index activates John`s Pen, her self-protection system personality, to reveal that Innocentius` power comes from runes placed around the building. Touma defeats Stiyl and Innocentius by setting off sprinklers to wash away the runes. However, because of Index`s wounds and Touma`s inability to use magic, he brings Index to the only non-esper he knows, that being his teacher Komoe Tsukuyomi. Source: wikipedia

episode.title: 必要悪の教会[ネセサリウス]
Necessarius (The Church of Necessary Evil)
Necessarius
episode.summary: Kamijo learns more about Index’s history with Necessarius, the Church of Necessary Evil. Later, after a trip to the bathhouse leads to an argument with Index, Kamijo finds himself in the company of a mysterious stranger. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 完全記憶能力
Perfect Memory Ability
Doskonała pamięć
Kanzen Kioku Nouryoku
episode.summary: Kaori Kanzaki confronts Kamijo, demanding that he hand over Index. Kamijo is wounded in the ensuing scuffle – and when he wakes up a few days later, Index offers to take drastic measures to protect him from further harm. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 十二時[リミット]
Limit (12 o`clock)
Limit
Limit
episode.summary: When Kamijo springs into action to prevent Kanzaki and Stiyl from erasing Index’s memory, he learns there’s a chance that the Church was lying about the threat to Index’s life all along! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 幻想殺し[イマジンブレイカー]
Imagine Breaker
Łamacz Woli
Imagine Breaker
episode.summary: Kamijo succeeds in eliminating the magical threat to Index’s life. Unfortunately, his memory is erased in the process! Later, Stiyl’s boss orders him to work with Kamijo. Their assignment: Find “Deep Blood.” Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 三沢塾[かがくすうはい]
The Science Cult (Misawa Cram School)
Kult nauki
Kagaku Suuhai
episode.summary: Stiyl tells Kamijo (who has no memory of the sorcerer) about his plan to raid Misawa Prep School in order to rescue a young girl who wields a vampire-summoning power known as Deep Blood. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 黄金練成[アルス=マグナ]
Ars Magna (Golden Transmutation)
Ars Magna
Ars Magna
episode.summary: Kamijo and Stiyl quickly fall under attack after infiltrating Misawa Prep School! During the raid, Kamijo runs into the girl they hoped to rescue – but there’s a chance she isn’t interested in leaving the campus! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 吸血殺し[ディープブラッド]
Deep Blood (Vampire Killer)
Głęboka Krew
Deep Blood
episode.summary: Aureolus finds his plan to turn Index into a vampire thwarted and learns that Kamijo has already saved Index’s memory. Overwhelmed by anger and jealousy, the alchemist attacks Kamijo in a fit of murderous rage. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: お姉様[みさかみこと]
Mikoto Misaka (Sissy)
Misaka Mikoto
episode.summary: Kamijo senses something odd about the relationship shared by Mikoto and Misaka, who appears to be Mikoto’s twin. Later, after a friendly meeting with Kamijo, Misaka has a much more intense encounter with Accelerator. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 妹達[シスターズ]
Sisters (Sisters)
Siostry
Sisters
episode.summary: Kamijo is surprised – and confused – by the sudden arrival of yet another Misaka doppelganger. When the new look-alike explains why there are so many Mikotos running around, Kamijo decides to investigate. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 絶対能力[レベル6]
Level 6 (Absolute Ability)
Poziom 6
Level 6
episode.summary: Kamijo learns that thousands of Mikoto clones were created for one simple, violent reason. Now that her look-alikes are dying off, the real Mikoto vows to save the rest of her doppelgangers by making the ultimate sacrifice. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一方通行[アクセラレータ]
Accelerator (One Way)
Akcelerator
Accelerator
episode.summary: During a trip the bathhouse, Komoe offers insight on the awakening of esper powers to Index and Himegami. Later, Mikoto is skeptical when Kamijo volunteers to take on Accelerator in battle. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最強[さいじゃく]VS最弱[さいきょう]
Weakest vs. Strongest (Strongest vs. Weakest)
Najsłabszy kontra najsilniejszy
Saijaku vs Saikyou
episode.summary: Kamijo fights Accelerator to gain a better life for Mikoto and her clones. When the battle ends, Misaka 10032 visits Kamijo in the hospital to discuss the steps that must be taken for the clones to adapt to life in Academy City. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 御使堕し[エンゼルフォール]
Angel Fall (Angel Fall)
Upadły Anioł
Angel Fall
episode.summary: After Kamijo travels to a beach-side resort to meet his family, he winds up tangling with a Russian sorcerer named Misha. Later, Kanzaki and Tsuchimikado explain the ramifications of a recently cast spell called Angel Fall. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 父親[かみじょうとうや]
Toya Kamijo (Father)
Kamijou Touya
episode.summary: After Kamijo and Tsuchimikado rush to confront Misha about her suspicious behavior, they realize that Toya might have something to do with the Angel Fall spell. Can Kamijo save his dad from the Russian sorcerer’s wrath? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大天使[かみのちから]
The Power of God (Archangel)
Boska moc
Kami no Chikara
episode.summary: After figuring out the truth of Misha’s real identity, Kanzaki sends Kamijo and Toya to destroy the ritual spot. When Tsuchimikado suggests that Toya must die for the spell to end, a violent – and seemingly fatal – encounter ensues. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 偽者[レプリカ]
Replica (Impostor)
Replika
Replica
episode.summary: In order to shake off the unwanted attention she’s getting from Unabara, Misaka asks Kamijo to pretend to be her boyfriend. Things get complicated when the faux-couple discovers that Unabara is hiding a magical secret. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 打ち止め[ラストオーダー]
Last Order (The End)
Ostatni Rozkaz cz. 1
Last Order
episode.summary: Accelerator meets the last of Misaka’s clones – Last Order – who explains the special role she played in the Sister experiment. Later, Accelerator learns what steps he’ll have to take to keep Last Order safe. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最終信号[ウィルスコード]
Virus Code (Final Signal)
Ostatni Rozkaz cz. 2
Virus Code
episode.summary: After Accelerator frees Last Order of the virus infecting her brain, he’s attacked by gun-wielding Amai. Just as all appears lost for Accelerator, Yoshikawa arrives to help – but Amai isn’t going down without a fight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: とある魔術の禁書目録[インデックス]たん
A Certain Magical Index-tan
어떤 마술의 인덱스-땅
Toaru Majutsu no Index-tan
正体不明[カウンターストップ]
Counter Stop (Identity Unknown)
Niwelator
Counter Stop
episode.summary: School’s back in session and that means new transfer students – one of which is Index! In class, Komoe offers more insight into the realities of life as an esper – and a powerful new magical presence is detected in Academy City. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 石像[ゴーレム]
Golem (Stone Figure)
Golem
episode.summary: Panic ensues in Academy City upon the arrival of the sorcerer Sherry Cromwell, who makes no secret of her plans to destroy Kazakiri! Kamijo steps up to ruin Sherry’s plot – but the situation is more complex than he knows. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 虚数学区・五行機関
Imaginary Number School District - Five-Element Agency
Sekcja Liczb Urojonych, Stowarzyszenia Pięciu Elementów
Kyosuu Gakku, Gogyou Kikan
episode.summary: Kamijo, Index and Kazakiri join forces to take on Ellis. When the battle ends, and with the support of Index, Kazakiri returns to the place of her origin. Later, Tsuchimikado ponders Aleister’s role in recent events. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 風斬氷華[トモダチ]
Friends (Hyoka Kazakiri)
Przyjaciółka
Tomodachi
episode.summary: Kamijo chases Sherry away only to discover the sorcerer now has designs on Index! Meanwhile, with her secret revealed, Kazakiri takes advantage of her new situation and sets out to fight Ellis. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: とある魔術の禁書目録[インデックス]たん 2
A Certain Magical Index-tan 2
어떤 마술의 인덱스-땅 II
Toaru Majutsu no Index-tan 2
